content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: To craft an iron_pickaxe, I need to craft 3 iron_ingots. To craft an iron_ingot, I need to place an iron_block into the furnace. Therefore I will move the iron_block from slot 31 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: The iron_block has been smelted into 9 iron ingots, so I will move these into a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 9, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I need to craft an iron pickaxe. The iron pickaxe recipe requires 3 iron ingots and 2 sticks. I will begin by moving one of the iron ingots to the top left corner of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_nugget", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Next, I will move another iron ingot to the right of the previous iron ingot.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "heavy_weighted_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 7, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Now, I will move the final iron ingot to the bottom left corner of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have placed all of the iron ingots required by the recipe. Now, I will move one of the sticks to the middle of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: Finally, I will move the last stick to the bottom of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 8 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "iron_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 8}, {"type": "polished_andesite", "quantity": 16, "index": 10}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 6, "index": 11}, {"type": "magenta_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 21}, {"type": "ghast_tear", "quantity": 15, "index": 23}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: I have finished crafting the iron pickaxe. I will move it from the crafting output slot to a free inventory slot.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
